features.text: Search for movies by name using Search panel.
A quick search for movies on the three categories (popular, top rated and upcoming) by clicking the corresponding button.
Adding to the Watchlist panel those movies that have been marked by the user.
Removing movies from the Watchlist panel.
Gettig full movie's overview by clicking "Read more..." link on the movie.
Saving movies in Watchlist panel even after reload or leaving the page.
